name: Stefan Heuser
biography: Stefan Heuser started training as a goldsmith in secondary school, and continued his studies in that field into university. From 2000 to 2004, he attended the Trier University of Applied Sciences in Idar-Oberstein, Germany, and the Hochschule für Gestaltung und Kunst in Zurich. He also participated in a class in jewelry and appliances taught by Otto Künzli at the Munich Fine Arts Academy. Since 2001, his work has been featured in many exhibitions throughout Europe, including Germany, the Netherlands, Switzerland and England. Heuser currently lives and works in Munich, Germany.
